stadium.name: The South Pole Palisade
stadium.description: A crude, fortified playing field built from rough-hewn logs. It's less a stadium and more a stockade against the wilderness. The 'grass' is mostly frozen mud and straw.

stats.pregame_ritual: Smelling their own game-worn socks from the previous match.
Braiding their hair into tight, battle-ready rows.
Listening to the wind for a sign of which way the game will turn.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Wearing a specific, garishly colored pair of undergarments.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Polishing their boots with bacon grease.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Reciting a short, epic poem about a past victory.
Turning their helmet around three times before putting it on.
Licking a whetstone.

stadium.name: The Stronghold Bailey
stadium.description: The team plays in the central bailey of Stronghold Castle, a massive fortress built on a plateau overlooking the city. The field is packed earth and cobblestone, and the crowd watches from the surrounding stone ramparts.

stats.pregame_ritual: Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Searching for a four-leaf clover near the sidelines.
Reciting a short, epic poem about a past victory.
Sharing a piece of fermented fish with a teammate.
Listening to the wind for a sign of which way the game will turn.
Eating a piece of honeycomb to 'sweeten' their victory.
Collecting a pebble from every field they've ever played on.
Tugging on their left earlobe three times.
Seeing who on the team can belch the loudest.
Tying a red string around their pinky finger.
Sharing a piece of fermented fish with a teammate.
Searching for a four-leaf clover near the sidelines.

preGame:
## üéôÔ∏è GREETINGS, SPORTS FANS AND SINNERS! 

Gather 'round your arcane receivers because Tuesday Night Trollball is coming to you live from the frozen edges of civilization! I‚Äôm your announcer, Nok the Corrupter, the demon who‚Äôs seen it all and lived to talk about it! We are deep in the playoffs now, and the atmosphere at the **South Pole Palisade** is absolutely bone-chilling! Literally! There‚Äôs freezing rain coming down, the field is a sheet of ice, and the wolves are howling in the woods like they‚Äôre waiting for leftovers! 

This is Game 2 of our Best of 3 series! The **New Ravenfall Commanders** already have one win in their pocket after that dominant display at the Bailey. If they win tonight, they punch their ticket to the next round and send the **South Pole Yetis** straight into the loser's bracket! The Yetis are playing for their lives today, and you can see the desperation in their eyes. I saw **Sale Tocci** earlier, meticulously braiding her hair into battle rows while **Udela Dorkus** was actually licking a whetstone! That‚Äôs the kind of dedication to violence that makes my demonic heart skip a beat! 

Meanwhile, the Commanders are looking as cocky as ever. **Jozef Pepe** is currently winning a belching contest in the dugout, and **Dusa Curson** is frantically searching the frozen mud for a four-leaf clover. Good luck with that, honey, the only thing growing here is frostbite! Even though they're associated with that letter-hating stick-in-the-mud Sir Tanos, you can't deny the Commanders have the momentum. Can the Yetis use the 'Icy Field' to their advantage, or will they be left out in the cold? Let‚Äôs get to the carnage! üèà‚ùÑÔ∏è
postGame:
## üèÜ COMMANDERS CLINCH! YETIS SENT TO THE COLD DARK BRACKET! 

**FINAL SCORE: New Ravenfall Commanders 4 - The South Pole Yetis 2**

What a spectacular display of frozen fury! The New Ravenfall Commanders have done it, folks! By winning this second game, they sweep the series 2-0 and advance in the playoffs, while the South Pole Yetis are headed to the loser's bracket to rethink their life choices! It was a battle of wills against the elements and each other, and the 'Castle Kids' proved they could handle the mud just as well as the cobblestone! 

The action started with a bang when **Sale Tocci** grabbed the head and tried to make a break for it! But the Commanders weren't having any of it. **Fleme Alis** showed us why he's a fan favorite by absolutely leveling **Ajit Serge** early on, sending him to the healers before the game even warmed up! The 'Wolf Pack Howling' in the background really added a nice touch of dread to the whole affair, don't you think? 

We saw some real 'playoff spirit' in the first half! **Duky Orelee** tried to get a pass going, but it was snagged right out of the air by **Jozef Pepe**! An interception in these conditions is like finding a gold coin in a goblin's ear‚Äîrare and messy! But the Yetis fought back with pure brutality. **Jessy Debbie** and **Isborne Krause** went on a rampage, injuring **Jessalin Zobias** and **Moir Sass** in quick succession. I haven't seen that much blood on ice since the Great Thaw of '42! 

The scoring opened up when **Rhett Gavrilla** took a chance from the Away Field. They launched that troll head with the precision of a master assassin, and SWISH! Two points for the Commanders! The few Commanders fans who made the trek to the Palisade started a chant that nearly drowned out the freezing rain. It was a beautiful moment of sporting excellence, even if Gavrilla does spend too much time picking up pebbles! 

But hold your horses, because the Yetis weren't dead yet! **Selima Si**, sporting those legendary garish undergarments for luck, found herself in the 2-point zone. She let fly a shot that sailed true, tying the game up at 2-2! The home crowd erupted, and for a second, it looked like the Yetis might actually force a Game 3. Imra and the Cedar Hill crowd probably started pouring the double-strength elixirs right then and there! 

However, **Jozef Pepe** had other plans! Just before the halftime whistle, Pepe‚Äîperhaps fueled by those pre-game belches‚Äîfired a rocket from Center Field! It hit the basket perfectly, putting the Commanders up 4-2. That‚Äôs why you play the game, folks! One minute you're tied, the next you're looking at a deficit while your teammates are getting patched up by **Seiter Aida**! 

Halftime was a flurry of activity! The healers were working overtime, and I‚Äôm pretty sure I saw **Hooge Imtiaz** use a warhammer to pop a shoulder back into place. Efficient! When the players came back out, the field was even slicker. **Coussoule Bidle** had a chance to tie it again, but his shot went wide, likely slipping on a patch of frozen straw. You hate to see it, but I love to watch it! 

The second half turned into a total brawl. **Udela Dorkus** took her whetstone-sharpened aggression out on **Rhett Gavrilla**, sending them to the sidelines. But Rhett came back with a vengeance! Once they were healed, Rhett went on a tackling spree, knocking out both **Jessy Debbie** and **Hilaire Guevara**! It was a masterclass in 'eye for an eye' Trollball! 

As the clock wound down, the Yetis just couldn't find their footing. **Sale Tocci** and **Sayers Erdda** tried to advance, but the Commanders' defense was a stone wall. **Jozef Pepe** even managed to put **Ajit Serge** back on the injury list for good measure! It‚Äôs that kind of relentless pursuit of victory that would make even Lord Orzalon crack a smile! 

So, the Commanders move on, and the Yetis are left to howl with the wolves in the loser's bracket. Maybe they should spend less time polishing boots with bacon grease and more time practicing their aim! Those 'heroes' from Ravenfall better enjoy the win while it lasts, because the competition is only getting fiercer. I‚Äôm Nok the Corrupter, and this has been a glorious Tuesday Night Trollball! Stay tuned, stay violent, and don't forget to pay your bar tabs! üèàüíÄüçπ
